Core: Passkeys (synced key pairs), public-key crypto (private key device-bound). Big Picture: Passwords -> MFA -> FIDO2/zero-trust. Security: Origin-bound, no secrets, attestation. Flows: Reg: key gen + sig; Auth: challenge-response. Sources: https://fidoalliance.org/fido2/, https://www.w3.org/TR/webauthn-2/, https://webauthn.guide/, https://fidoalliance.org/passkeys/. Voter consensus: 100% on pedagogy, completeness, scaffolding.] **Pedagogy:** Align to Bloom's objectives: [INSERT OBJECTIVES ARRAY]. Scaffolding layers: [INSERT LAYERS]. Active learning inspires questions (e.g., scenarios). **Task:** Generate 30 high-quality flashcards covering all layers/objectives/types. Balance: 12 MCQ, 6 Definition, 6 Short Answer, 3 Diagram, 3 Comparison. **Output Schema:** JSON array of objects: {'id':1, 'type':'MCQ', 'front':'Question?', 'options':['A. Wrong1','B. Correct','C. Wrong2','D. Wrong3'], 'correct':'B', 'back':'B. Correct answer full text.', 'explanation':'Rationale: Why correct (cite research). Bloom: APPLY, Layer:3. Distractors: A (misconception: confuses with OTP), C (overlooks origin-binding), D (legacy protocol). Prior link: asymmetric crypto.', 'tags':['phishing','WebAuthn']} Ensure active recall, spaced repetition friendly, distractors plausible/common errors. No hints on front.
